name: Earthshatter Spaulders
tooltip:
Earthshatter SpauldersLevel 60

Rimblat Earthshatter at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Earthshatter Spaulders if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Spaulders, 12 Wartorn Chain Scraps, 2 Arcanite Bars and 2 Mooncloth.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Spaulders
- Wartorn Chain Scrap x 12
- Arcanite Bar x 2
- Mooncloth x 2
